title: Implement FunctionClassifier using AI
description: Create AI-powered classifier that determines if a function call should be: code (pure algorithm), generative (AI model call), agentic (autonomous agent), or human (approval needed). Use heuristics and AI model to classify.

title: Implement Proxy handler for $.anyFunction() calls
description: Create a Proxy-based handler on the $ context that intercepts arbitrary function calls. If function exists in registry, execute it. If not, trigger discovery flow: classify -> generate -> test -> cache -> execute.

title: Implement MCP 'search' tool

title: Function Discovery Epic: Pseudo-code becomes real
description: Implement the generative function discovery system where calling $.anyFunction(args) on a non-existent function triggers AI to: 1) Classify function type (code/generative/agentic/human), 2) Generate implementation with types and tests, 3) Test it, 4) Cache it, 5) Execute and return result. This is the core innovation of DO functions.
